Package org.jboss.soa.esb.services.jbpm.actionhandlers

Class Summary
ActionUtil Utils class for methods that are common to different EsbAction handlers and notifiers.
EsbActionHandler Send messages to ESB services from jBPM applications, and leaves the node in a wait state, waiting for a call back.
EsbNotifier Sends ESB messages to ESB services from jBPM in an asynchronous way
  • esbCategoryName - for ESB registry lookup
  • esbServiceName - for ESB registry lookup
